full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SHES RAB SNYING PO'I SGO NAS BDUD BZLOG DANG GLUD RDZONG BYA TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI 'BRAS YUL SKYIL TSAL MKHAN ZUR SUM PA PAndI TA YE SHES DANG LA 'BYOR BA'I LEGS BSHAD SHER SNYING GI SGRUB THABS LAS SBYOR DANG BCAS PA MUN SEL SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA LAS KHOL DU PHYUNG BA YIN ZHING, MNGA' RIS PA ZLA RGYAL GYI SLOB MA ZHANG DBU DKAR BA'I PHYAG SROL LTAR GYI 'DI'I BDUD BZLOG GI CHO GA RGYAS PA ZHIG ^PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI SLOB MA BKRAS LHUN BKA' CHEN ZHIG GIS MDZAD PA ZHIG KYANG SNANG MOD KYANG, 'DI NI 'BYOR DMAN LA'ANG @014B BLA MA TSOGS CHUNG DON CHE BA'I LEGS BSHAD DU SNANG LA, GONG GI MGRON GZUGS MZO TSUL NI NYER MKHO ZUR GSAL RIN CHEN SGRON BU LAS BTUS ZER BA ZHIG LAS BYUNG BA LTAR BKOD PA STE, DE GANG GIS MDZAD MA 'CHAL KYANG DE'I NANG DU GDON BGEGS SO SO'I BYED PA BSHAD TSUL SOGS NI GZHUNG CHEN MO RNAMS DANG DE TZAM MI 'GAL ZHING, LHAG DRU DER 'JIG RTEN SKYONG BA BZHI ZHES PA RGYAL CHEN BZHE LA BYED PA MI 'THAR CING DGA' RAB DBANG PHYUG GI 'KHOR GTZO 'GRO BA LA 'THAB GA-YENG 'DU SHES LOG PA LHAG PAR CHAGS PA BYED PA'I 'JIG RTEN SKYONG BA BZHI LA NGOS BZUNG DGOS TSUL SMOS PA MUN SEL SGRON ME NYID DANG SHIN TU MTHUN TSABS CHE BAR YOD PA LA DMAGS NA, @015A *, ,DE MA BAN CHEN RANG GIS MDZAD PA 'AM, MANG NA DE'I GSUNG RGYUN LTAR BKOD PA'I GDUNG ZHIG YIN SHAS CHE SNYAM STE RE ZHIG DE LA TSAD MAR BYAS PA LEGS SO,, SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
